All night reception, good breakfast, perfect location
Location Good Wi-Fi Friendly and helpful stuff Tasty breakfast
Furniture in the bathroom needs to be renovated  No parking available
Booking this place for the second time in a row.
Best of it: location, decent breakfast, clean.
Paper walls: you can (and you will) hear everything.
Some furniture is a little bit old.
The bathroom is not that good ventilated. "–ü–∞–ø–µ—Ä–æ–≤—ñ" —Å—Ç—ñ–Ω–∏: –≤–∏ –∑–º–æ–∂–µ—Ç–µ –ø–æ—á—É—Ç–∏ (—ñ –≤–∏ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç–µ —á—É—Ç–∏) –≤—Å–µ.
A very good location (between the railway station and the city centre), A good breakfast; for extra money but many options so anyone can find something to eat.
The hotel itself and the rooms: not brand new, but it is noticeable that it is being constantly renovated.
Bad air ventilation in the bathroom (but many hotels - and even those that are more expensive have the same problem).
Some towels in my room were very old (but clean - I must admit).
A single bed is quite narrow.

For English speaking guests, this hotel pretty much sucks, they don‚Äôt provide toothpaste and toothbrushes, which is a MUST for a place that‚Äôs called ‚Äúa hotel‚Äù.
No slippers, no robes, you‚Äôll have to walk barefoot on the carpet where u walk with your shoes on.
Lickage in the toilet was really loud, couldn‚Äôt sleep, had to ask for a hairdryer at the reception and breakfast was really boring, only 2 choices:eggs (fried or omelet) and oatmeal.
And the whole place in general is old, u can find a better one for 1000 hryvnyas per night.
Only location is good, right next to city center.
There are two small beds, two small nightstands and wardrobe, but all is new and sized ok.
Towels and line are comfortable and clean, too.
Hotel is too close to the railways.
Trains are well heard even though closed windows.
But near beds are left the earplugs.
Pretty good alternative to the hostel.
In general, sadly enough, but at least you have a separate room.
Within walking distance of the center.

Everything: it is perfectly located, the room we had was nice and clean.
The breakfast was really good and tasty.
Furthermore, if you order lunch there, you would be surprised of a good pricing, which was of a better price than you would have it somewhere in the city centre or around.
The only minor thing to mention is that a double bed is composed of 2 separate beds / mattresses
Also there is available transfer to the cool beach
This problem was solved by wire
Good modern hotel, and their prices make them the best hotel is the city! =)
Breakfast, comfortable room and kind hotel staff.
I was expecting only tea or only coffee for the breakfast, but hotel nicely surprises us offering porridge/pancake/cheesecake/omelet/eggs with bacon.
Sadly, in our room, we had no spoon and/or fork, but you can ask those on the bar.
Also, after first night one of the table legs broke.
Do not know, if it was our fault or that damage was done before, but last night we were sleeping very carefully.
And the last, but not the least, noise insulation is really bad.
You clearly can hear other going through the hall, sometimes you can hear others TV's or voices.
